amendment.description: Amendment modifies the current statutory prohibition on members of Congress contracting with the federal government to include the President, Vice President, and any Cabinet member.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to amend the current statutory prohibition on members of Congress contracting with the federal government to include the President, Vice President, and any Cabinet member.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 186, 1 Present (Roll no. 446).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 243 - 186, 1 Present (Roll no. 446).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
